mainSubheading: Interested in traveling for fun or for medical reasons to a city full of colonial heritage? Cartagena Hostess is here to help you each step of the way.

features.title: Our Services
features.medicalTabDesc: Save money without cutting quality. Let us handle your accommodation and care arrangements so you can focus on healing and wellness.
features.recreationalTabDesc: Enjoy staying in a romantic, colorful, vibrant coastal city with the useful insights only a local can provide.
features.trustedPractitionersDesc: We will only refer you to healthcare practitioners that we trust and have worked with for years.
features.prePostCareDesc: We are qualified to provide you with adequate nursing care. Expect to be treated kindly and patiently.
features.dentalWorkDesc: Dental prostheses, veneers, smile design... you name it.
features.comesticTreatmentsDesc: 'We offer cosmetic surgical procedures such as face-lift done by professionals we trust.'
features.aiportTransfersDesc: We'll pick you up in the Arrivals hall and drop you off at the airport upon departure. If you prefer to be picked up someplace else, feel free to let us know.
features.translationDesc: No Spanish, No Problem. We offer translation services so you can communicate with locals or with your doctors (if need be).
features.translationForRecreationalTouristsDesc: No Spanish, No Problem. We offer translation services so you can communicate with locals.
features.lodgingDesc: Know where to stay and where not to. If you already have a place in mind, feel free to run it by us.
features.apartmentsDesc: Enjoy free breakfast if you prefer to stay in one of our furnished apartment options.
features.transportationDesc: Our trusted drivers will pick you up and take you to your destination. Don't worry about figuring out public transport or about crazy taxi fares.
features.tripsDesc: Whether you want to get a mud bath in El Volc√°n del Totumo or visit beautiful beaches in nearby coastal cities, we can take you there. Just let us know and we'll arrange your transport.

footer.desc: Making recreational and medical tourism a breeze.

about.us: Cartagena Hostess is a project that aims to fill the needs of recreational and medical tourists who want to feel safe and relaxed knowing their trustworthy hostess is there to guide them. We have been helping visitors enjoy a pleasant experience for a couple of years and now we are looking forward to welcoming many more with outstretched arms.
about.lisneyDesc: Meet your hostess. After returning from the United States to Colombia, I began forming trust relationships with the people who work with me today. Being surrounded by tourists, I have noticed their frequent distrust, and rightly so; most of the time they don't have any previous contact with locals before their trip. My goal is to make you feel at home.
